price: Ṣé wọn kò ronú sí ọ̀rọ̀ náà ni? Tàbí ohun tó dé bá wọn jẹ́ ohun tí kò dé bá àwọn bàbá wọn àkọ́kọ́ rí ni?
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَدَّبَّرُواْ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ أَمۡ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمۡ يَأۡتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: afalam yaddabbarū al-qawla am jāahum mā lam yati ābāahumu al-awalīna
